entry.title: Publications
entry.content:
Research is what I’m doing when I don’t know what I’m doing.

— Wernher von Braun (1912–1977)

Journals

[2020]

  1. Research on information steganography based on network data stream
    Jiazhong Lu, Weisha Zhang, Ziye Deng, Shibin Zhang, Yan Chang, Xiaolei Liu*
    Neural Computing and Applications
  2. Tracking the Insider Attacker: A Blockchain Traceability System for Insider Threats
    Teng Hu, Bangzhou Xin, Xiaolei Liu, Ting Chen, Kangyi Ding, Xiaosong Zhang*
    Sensors
  3. An equalisation control method for network big data transmission based on parallel computing
    Jiazhong Lu, Xiaosong Zhang*, Xiaolei Liu, Teng Hu, Yu Cao
    International Journal of Internet Protocol Technology

[2019]

  1. Network Intrusion Feature Map Node Equalization Algorithm Based on Modified Variable Step-Size Constant Modulus
    Jiazhong Lu, Xiaolei Liu, Teng Hu, Jianwei Zhang, Xiaosong Zhang
    International Journal of Pattern Recognition and Artificial Intelligence
  2. Evolution-algorithm-based unmanned aerial vehicles path planning in complex environment
    Xiaolei Liu, Xiaojiang Du, Xiaosong Zhang, Qingxin Zhu, Mohsen Guizani
    Computers & Electrical Engineering

    Xiaolei Liu,Yuheng Luo,Lin Shao,Xiaosong Zhang,Qingxin Zhu

    Jiazhong Lu, Fengmao Lv, Zhongliu Zhuo, Xiaosong Zhang, Xiaolei Liu, Teng Hu, Wei Deng
    Security and Communication Networks
  5. A Lockable Abnormal Electromagnetic Signal Joint Detection Algorithm
    Jiazhong Lu, Weina Niu, Xiaolei Liu, Teng Hu, Xiaosong Zhang
    International Journal of Pattern Recognition and Artificial Intelligence
  6. An Insider Threat Detection Approach Based on Mouse Dynamics and Deep Learning
    Teng Hu, Weina Niu, Xiaosong Zhang, Xiaolei Liu, Jiazhong Lu, Yuan Liu
    Security and Communication Networks
  7. Adversarial Samples on Android Malware Detection Systems for IoT Systems
    Xiaolei Liu, Xiaojiang Du, Xiaosong Zhang, Qingxin Zhu, Hao Wang, Mohsen Guizani
    Sensors 19 (4), 974

[2018]

  1. Adversarial Attacks Against Profile HMM Website Fingerprinting Detection Model
    Xiaolei Liu, Zhongliu Zhuo, Xiaojiang Du, Xiaosong Zhang, Qingxin Zhu, Mohsen Guizani
    Cognitive Systems Research

    Xiaolei Liu, Xiaosong Zhang, Nadra Guizani, Jiazhong Lu, Qingxin Zhu, Xiaojiang Du
    Sensors 18 (8), 2630

    Xiaolei Liu, Xiaosong Zhang, Teng Hu, Qingxin Zhu

    Xiaolei Liu, Xiaosong Zhang, Yiqi Jiang, Qingxin Zhu

  1. Modified t-distribution evolutionary algorithm for dynamic deployment of wireless sensor networks
    Xiaolei Liu, Xiaosong Zhang, Yiqi Jiang, Qingxin Zhu

entry.title: Brief Bio
entry.content:
Research is an organized method of trying to find out what you are going to do after you cannot do what you are doing now.

– Charles F. Kettering (1876–1958)

Email: isxiaolei AT foxmail DOT com
Google Scholar

Xiaolei Liu is an assistant research fellow in Institute of Computer Application. He received the Ph.D. degree and M.S. degree in software engineering from the University of Electronic and Technology of China (UESTC). His research interests include AI security, Adversarial Example and Swarm Intelligence Optimization Algorithm. His homepage is at https://xiaolei.tech

entry.title: Funding
entry.content:
All I’m armed with is research.

– Mike Wallace (1918–2012)

Current Grants

  1. Title: Research on Security Analysis and Detection Technology of Artificial Intelligence Algorithm
    Agency/Program: Director of Computer Application Research Institute Foundation
    Duration: 2020.01 ~ 2021.12
    PI: Xiaolei Liu

Past Grants

  1. Title: Research on Trusted and Secure Embedded Software System Based on Android
    Agency/Program: Sichuan Science and Technology Program
    Duration: 2019.01 ~ 2020.06
    PI: Xiaolei Liu

  2. Title: Research on Intelligent Audit Technology for Android Malware
    Agency/Program: Sichuan Science and Technology Program
    Duration: 2018.01 ~ 2019.01
    PI: Teng Hu (CO-PI: Xiaolei Liu)

  3. Title: Research on Sensitive Data Protection Mechanism for MapReduce
    Agency/Program: Sichuan Science and Technology Program
    Duration: 2016.01 ~ 2016.12
    PI: Xiaolei Liu

entry.title: News
entry.content:
The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.

– John D. Rockefeller (1839–1937)
  • PC member of AAAI-21 Demonstrations
  • Paper got accepted to 25th Australasian Conference on Information Security and Privacy (ACISP 2020)
  • Program Committee @ ICAIE 2020
  • Program Committee @ AICS 2020
  • Paper got accepted to Thirty-Fourth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI 2020)
